title: Private meeting space with audio-visual connectivity
posting_body: ['Six Weeks Free on All Apartment Floor Plans and Renovation Styles - Tour & Apply This Week!', '$250 Waived Sky Lounge Fee, too :)', "Welcome Home to The Elements at Sloan's Lake Apartments", 'Living well at The elements extends to the great outdoors.', 'Breathe in the natural beauty of majestic mountaintops and the sprawling lake just outside your front door.', 'For those seeking an active, adventurous lifestyle, enjoy kayaking, hiking, and boating on the lake, or venture out for some whitewater rafting, expert rock climbing, and horseback riding.', 'And, within minutes you can enjoy popular boutiques, restaurants, and entertainment venues in downtown Denver.', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 28', 'OR Text', '28', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text with us.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a Studio, 1 Bath, approximately 450-480 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', "- The elements at Sloan's lake is undergoing a transformation.", 'Apartments on the 8th through 14th Floors - all with stunning views of the mountains and the city - will be fully renovated and feature a number of amenities.', '- There are three options for renovation styles.', 'The "Retro" Style maintains all the elements we loved from the mid-century era, updated with stylish, contemporary finishes and all with stunning views.', 'The "Premium" apartments on the 11th floors are completed renovated residences with upgraded kitchens, spa bathroom features, and unparalleled views.', 'The "Penthouse" Style on Floors 13th & 14th are the most luxurious residences featuring open concept space plans, deluxe kitchens, spa bath design, surrounded by picturesque mountain and cityscape views.', '*Built in USB ports (Premium + Penthouse)', '*Large Kitchen Island and Dining Bar (Premium + Penthouse)', '*Spa Style Bath with Floating Vanity (Premium + Penthouse)', '*Nostalgic 50s style kitchen steel cabinets (Retro + Penthouse)', '*LED Lighting (All)', '*Pendant lighting in kitchen (Premium)', '*Custom maple finish kitchen cabinets (Premium)', '*Vinyl Wood Plank Flooring (All)', '*Luxury carpeting (Premium)', '*Stainless steel appliances (All)', '*Upgraded Bathroom Renovation with Ceramic Tile Shower (All)', '*Custom Modern Countertops (Retro)', '*Smark Lock Entry (All)', '*Quartz Countertops and Tile Backsplash (Premium)', '*Smart Lock Entry (All)', 'Community Amenities', '- Large coworking space with panoramic views, outlets and USB ports', '- Onsite Pet Grooming Station (coming Fall 2020)', '- Spacious outdoor lounge and fire pit with a view of the Denver city skyline', '- Outdoor grilling and dining area with sweeping views of the mountains', '- Top of the line fitness center featuring a Peloton bike', '- Private meeting space with audio-visual connectivity', '- Modern mail center and parcel storage with automatic notification system', '- Outdoor space for programmed fitness, yoga and stretching overlooking the Rockies', '- Beautifully Appointed Penthouse Lounge', '- Secure key fob entry to the building and residences', '- Community kitchenette with coffee service and refrigerator', '- 1-bedroom hospitality suite rental available for friends and family', '- Bike, ski and snowboard storage', 'onsite with repair tools (coming Fall 2020)', 'Pet Policy', 'We love your pets and are excited to welcome them to their new home!', 'We allow TWO pets per apartment home!', 'Pet Deposit for 1 Pet: $100', 'Pet Fee for 1 Pet: $250', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 1 Pet: $35', 'Pet Deposit for 2 Pets: $200', 'Pet Fee for 2 Pets: $400', 'Monthly Pet Rent for 2 Pets: $65', 'Income Requirements:', 'Minium of 2.5x the monthly rent', 'Office Hours', 'Monday-Friday:10:00AM-6:00PM', 'Saturday:10:00AM-5:00PM', "The Elements at Sloan's Lake", '1590 Yates St, Denver, CO, 80204', 'g5G83BYqRxuV']
